message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $12,000. I believe it offers significant value, but I'm open to discussing the price further.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe the product could be available at a lower price. I am willing to pay up to $10,000 for it.
Hi Bob, I understand your perspective on the pricing.  While the product is worth a great deal to me, I'm willing to come down to $11,000. I believe this price reflects its true value.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your price. I appreciate it. However, I still believe there might be room for negotiation. I am willing to pay $9,500 for the product.
